info.name: AnimeShow.tv - Anime - Dark Matter
info.description: Dark theme with sweet accents for AnimeShow.tv Full mobile compatibility, removes intrusive ads, set of sweet wallpapers; or choose your own! you can also choose to show or hide the logo of the site. This style is used best with ghostery + adblockplus
info.additionalInfo: Version 4.5 Make sure to try my other userstyles: https://userstyles.org/users/299934 If you find any bugs, report it as a question. WANT MORE WALLPAPERS? copy the image addresses from my Imgur Album 1. http://imgur.com/gallery/cjlih
